name: Bit Astro
description:
Hello and thank you for taking a look at this page!

Bit Astro is a game where you control a space fighter to fight against various enemies from 4 unique stages, with 8 different soundtracks! Each level only takes you less than 5 minutes to finish, so you can play it anytime.

This is the first game I published and I made everything all by myself, including the code, the art, and the music. I'm still in high school so it might not be as great as other games, but I hope you enjoy it!

My Twitter: @seiya_0627_bw

I started using Twitter and I will post things I made there in the future!
